title: Practice Challenge: Build a Profile Card
description:
Create a profile card using Tailwind utility classes:

1. Card container with:
   - White background, rounded corners, shadow
   - Padding and max-width

2. Avatar section with:
   - Circular image placeholder
   - Centered

3. User info with:
   - Name (large, bold)
   - Title (smaller, gray)
   - Bio (normal text)

4. Action buttons with:
   - Follow (blue) and Message (gray) buttons
   - Hover states
instructions: Build a profile card by logging the Tailwind classes you would use. Simulate the component structure.

hints.text: Use bg-white, rounded-xl, shadow-lg for the card container
Use flex and justify-center to center the avatar
Add hover: prefixes for interactive states

commonMistakes.mistake: Using dynamic class names like bg-${color}-500
commonMistakes.consequence: Tailwind purges classes it can't detect at build time
commonMistakes.correction: Use complete class names and map them to values
